titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices of Ireland. A Proclamation. Sydney, Tho. Coningsby. It haveing pleased almighty God in his great mercy and goodness, in a most extraordinary manner, not onely to preserve his Majesties sacred person, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke printer to the [King and Queen at their Majesties Printing-House on Ormonde Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin the 22th day of October 1690 and in the second year of their Majestys reign".
"Appointing 16 Nov. a day of publick thanksgiving."--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 193. mer- Provinces for.
1998 microform ed. damaged at foot affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their Majesties Printing-House on Ormonde Key
